com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.mantisRobot

Class MantisRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.entity.Entity
      • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.physicalObject.PhysicalObject
        • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.robot.Robot
          • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.mantisRobot.MantisRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkConnectionListener, Serializable

    public class MantisRobot
extends Robot
    Robot Overlord simulation of Andreas Hoelldorfer's MANTIS 5DOF robot arm.
    Author:
    Dan Royer
    See Also:
    MANTIS on Hackaday.io, Serialized Form
